column1: The Pit Room////Now this is great barbecue! The brisket melts in your mouth and the ribs are tasty. I like the sides
column2: but would come here for the excellent brisket alone. The Pit Room is a tad pricey compared to other barbecue joints
column3: but it's worth it.  Before COVID
column4: the Pit Room catered a party for me and the guests raved about how great the food was.  (We had brisket
column7: go to the Pit Room! Life is too short for bad barbecue.
